snippet: Mary Higgins Clark has a one-bedroom pied-à-terre on Central Park South.
abstract: Author Mary Higgins Clark loves her one-bedroom uncluttered pied-a-terre on Central Park South for its traditional style decor with mixed European references and stunning views of the park.
lead_paragraph: Mary Higgins Clark has a one-bedroom pied-à-terre on Central Park South.

headline.seo: Mary Higgins Clark on Central Park South
headline.main: Where the Grande Dame of the Thriller Chills
headline.print_headline: Where the Grande Dame of the Thriller Chills
